arts.ttl: Real Madrid duo picks up knock vs Rayo Vallecano; to undergo tests tomorrow
arts.sum: Real Madrid’s poor run of form continued as they were held to a goalless draw by Rayo Vallecano at the Vallecas. In what was their final game before the November international break, the team struggled with creativity and dynamism in the final third of the game. arts.ttl: Rayo Vallecano 0-0 Real Madrid: Report & Full Match Highlights in Frustrating Draw
arts.sum: Although the best chances fell to the away side, Los Franjirrojos looked dangerous on the counter and had Real scrambling a few times without any end product. It was a slow start to the second half, but ten minutes in, Real Madrid began to turn the screw.
